message:
Could any one guide me how can i perform SQL "LIKE" operation on Firebase?. 

I googled and all results are talking about integrating search engine with Firebase (i.e ElasticSearch).

I wonder Is there a solution provided by google to do such this search operations on Firebase ?

data.message:
Looks like it doesn't have.

I made this google search:
firebase built in sql "like"

Which led me to this:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/22506531/how-to-perform-sql-like-operation-on-firebase

But I thought maybe it's 2014, a bit old, and then saw this:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/38618953/how-to-do-a-simple-search-in-string-in-firebase-database
and this:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39058119/firebase-database-requests-and-queries-like-sql-where-in

Which confirmed the same thing.

I think that's why you can't find anything about how to do it with Firebase itself, because it's not supported in the first place.
So  If someone here has faced this problem before.,and he did a  solution for this. If he can give me a bit of his experience ?
